\w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H4421"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w that|strong="H4421"\w* contend \w with|strong="H4421"\w* \w thee|strong="H1245"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H4421"\w* \w thee|strong="H1245"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H4421"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thing \w of|strong="H4421"\w* \w nought|strong="H3808"\w*.
